article_title: More Than One In 10 American Workers Unemployed Or Underemployed

article_metadata.description: The labor market remains much weaker than unemployment rate alone suggests. Tens of millions of Americans are unemployed, underemployed, or have been encouraged to stop working because of big government policies and low-wages.
article_metadata.author: Abby McCloskey
